drag_slides_here: Drag slides here to build your deck
table_management_desc: Browse and manage application database tables.
overview_presentations: Overview of your presentations and processing status.
click_browse_computer: Or click to browse your computer (Max 50MB)
no_files_uploaded: No files uploaded yet. Drag one above!
search_instantly: Enter keywords to find slides instantly.
mission_desc: SlideForge aims to revolutionize presentation management by providing a metadata-driven, AI-powered orchestrator for your PPTX assets.
security_desc: Your data stays in your perimeter. We prioritize local processing and secure handling of all your presentation metadata.
core_engine_desc: Powered by advanced NLP and computer vision to extract meaningful insights from every slide automatically.
platform_intel_desc: A unified interface for searching, selecting, and generating high-impact decks with minimal friction.
tech_stack_desc: SlideForge is built on a foundation of high-performance, modern technologies.
marketing_tagline: Where raw data becomes brilliant insight.
marketing_desc: SlideForge doesn't just store files; it understands them. Our engine extracts the hidden value in your presentations, making your organizational knowledge searchable, reusable, and actionable.
built_with: Built with passion by the Digitial Blacksmiths team.
